text: Joel Edward Horlen (August 14, 1937 - April 11, 2022) an American professional baseball pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) from 1961 to 1972 for the Chicago White Sox and Oakland Athletics. He was born in San Antonio, Texas. In 2017, it was announced that he had Alzheimer's disease. He died on April 11, 2022 at the age of 84.Cowboy Baseball Hall Of Famer Horlen Passes Away ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Oakland Athletics players Category:Sportspeople from San Antonio, Texas Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease
title: Joe Horlen
